LanguageData.JRWDeinosuchus.label: Deinosuchus
LanguageData.JRWDeinosuchus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #029803-1858 [DEINOSUCHUS RUGOSUS] CODENAME: AMBUSH >2366
An extinct genus related to the modern day alligator. With its powerful jaws this creature is able to take down dinosaurs with ease, drowning and tearing their victims apart after ambushing them from the water below.
